channel.title: [PI] Npc Problems [PI]
channel.description: On my rsps npcs stand under me when i pk someone else, and i don't know how to fix it, the only reason its a problem is because then npcs health bar gets in the way. I'm using Project Z as my base so the zombies get in my way and stand under me and attack the person I'm pking. could someone like show me how to make the combat better or a tutorial on how to make them not stand under me ? thanks

item.title: [PI] Npc Problems [PI]
